snippet: As the Cave Singers discovered before their set, when a drummer starts steadily tapping his kit to make sure it's coming through, a good part of the audience might start clapping along.
abstract: As the Cave Singers discovered before their set, when a drummer starts steadily tapping his kit to make sure it's coming through, a good part of the audience might start clapping along.

headline.main: Bonnaroo: Getting in on the Act
